long_description: Fly down the hill in the soft-flexing, lightweight Burton Jet snowboard boots. These boots are for you if you're a progressing rider that's looking to explore the entire mountain. Shrinkage(TM) footprint reduction technology reduces the boots overall length by 1 size, helping to eliminate toe drag. Phantom linerless construction makes the boots extremely lightweight and comfortable, and easier to get on and off. Streamlined Speed Dial lacing system lets you twist your laces tight; laces are constantly fully engaged when tightening or loosening. Exit is easy with a quick pull of the dial top loop. Soft-flexing, 3D molded tongues wrap your forefeet in comfort and offer a seamless flex; snowproof internal gusset keeps feet dry and comfortable. Molded EVA footbeds offer all-day comfort. DynoLite outsoles are lightweight yet offer consistent support and cushioning; soles provide great traction on varied terrain.
short_description: Fly down the hill in the soft-flexing, lightweight Burton Jet snowboard boots. These boots are for you if you're a progressing rider that's looking to explore the entire mountain.
